name: hop_docgen

createDocGenTask.name: createDocGenTask
createDocGenTask.comment:
Creates documentation and populates the hop_docgen/hop_docgen.createDocGenTask.targetBranch on the local git repository.

hop_docgen/hop_docgen.createDocGenTask.compiledViewerPath points to the compiled output of dartdoc-viewer or similiar. The contents of hop_docgen/hop_docgen.createDocGenTask.compiledViewerPath are copied and the output from docgen is placed in a docs directory within the copied content.

If hop_docgen/hop_docgen.createDocGenTask.targetBranch is not provided, gh-pages is used as the default value.

packageIntro:
!Hop!

hop_docgen

Hop task for creating, publishing, and updating documentation for your Dart project
